Fresh new website to make it easier to contribute & start using Status

- Developer & Educator resources & open issues
- List of Community Groups
- List of active swarms 

Check it out. Install Status. Get Involved https://status.im/ pic.twitter.com/p5otmRBhaj

Embark v4.0 is now released!

After months of hard work we're finally ready to announce that Embark v4 is out and ready to use for everyone!

 Cockpit
 Debugger
 Better integration with existing tooling

Read the full announcement

1115181285872414720.text:
Embark's deployment hooks make it very easy to execute specific code when your Smart Contracts are being deployed.

- onDeploy - runs when a contract is deployed
- afterDeploy - runs when all contracts are deployed
- deployIf - conditional deployment

https://embark.status.im/docs/contracts_configuration.html#Deployment-hooks …
